title: Heirloom Ruby and Emerald Statement Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Bridal Masterpiece
materials: Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance. Locket details: Diamonds (1.95 carats total)
features: Intricately designed Haaram featuring a central pendant. The necklace showcases a stunning blend of rubies, emeralds, and diamonds in a floral and geometric pattern. Diamond-studded filigree work with Ruby bead accents. The Locket's shape is floral and ornate with Diamond-studded filigree work.
colors: and Sparkling White Diamonds set against the warm tone of 22K Gold. A classic and auspicious South Indian color palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also a statement piece for high-profile social events
adding a touch of regal elegance.
description: This exquisite Haaram is a true investment piece, blending traditional South Indian design with modern craftsmanship. The combination of rubies, emeralds, and diamonds symbolizes prosperity, growth, and enduring love. Its exceptional craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and makes it a treasured family heirloom. Certified gemstones guarantee value and quality.
